aboutUs.title:
Why you should trust
Get To Know About Us
aboutUs.subTitle: StaffRex is an established independent medical, nursing and care recruitment agency, operating globally, sourcing and placing physicians, nurses and allied health professionals, in the UK, India.
aboutUs.recruitmentAndStaffingTitle: We specialise in the recruitment and staffing of:
aboutUs.recruitmentAndStaffingBody:
We offer excellent service and care as standard, with tailor made recruitment packages to suit every unique requirement, large or small and at every level within the healthcare sector.

Our service is friendly, reliable, professional and personal â€“ and tailored to your needs, our experienced consultants operate with energy and enthusiasm to deliver our promises in a way that is clear, simple and effective. We believe in good communication and constantly seek to improve.

about.aboutStaffRex: Staffrex was started in November 2021. We are mainly working with RGN's, RMNs, Doctors, and IT Professionals. Most of our candidates are referred by our Existing / deployed candidates due to our high quality of service. We provide 360-degree support to candidates from recruitment to onboarding. StaffRex has a good number of CBT Passed candidates. We have an experienced team of Recruiters and Compliance staff and we are also tied up with third-party agencies for the initial screening and verification of candidates' documents. We also provide in-house training for OET (Coimbatore) and IELTS (Bangalore) in India
outreachChannelsList: International sourcing team in India and UK

teamLists.name: RAVISH KUMAR
teamLists.about: Mr. Ravish Kumar is from India, living in Aberdeen, Scotland for more than 7 years. He is an IT graduate with immense Procurement & Supply Chain Management experience for 10+ years in the IT & Banking Sector. He has 3+years of experience in a Recruitment Agency as a Compliance & Account Manager and Managed 4 Major NHS Trusts in England and deployed around 300+ Nurses. Before Registering StaffRex Limited, he worked as a freelancer for international nurses and has successfully deployed 18 nurses in NHS hospitals through various agencies.

whyChooseUs: Good Pipeline of candidates at different stages of application
Guidance and support throughout the process
Managed Video interviews with dedicated support
Talking about the life in the UK: Expenses, health care, NHS working conditions, weather etc
Regular communication with the nurse and live update to clients.

eligibility.nmcDescription: NMC (Nursing And Midwifery Council) is a regulator for nursing and midwifery associates. Nurses who work in the UK should have registered with NMC to ensure that the qualifications of the nurses are according to the established standards.
